mapper.select: select '' as origin, -- 지역코드 '' as PTVehicleIDNumber, -- veh_id '' as SubRouteIdentityNumber, -1 as BusEventCodeNumber, -- event_cd -1 as BusRunCodeNumber , false as LastPTVehicle, '010000' as EndNodeZoneIDNumber, -- 종점 정류소 ID -1 as EndNodeRouteSequence, -- 종점_노선_내 순번 -1 as BusTotalSeatsNumber, -1 as BusPassengerNumber, -1 as BusRemainSeatsNumber, -- 버스 이벤트 데이터 now() as MessageGenerationTime, '' as NodeZoneIDNumber, -1 as NodeRouteSequence, now() as NodeZoneEntryTime, now() as NodeZoneExitTime, -1 as NodeZoneTripTime, -- 버스 정주기 데이터 36.0 as PTVehicleCoordinateLati, 127.0 as PTVehicleCoordinateLong, now() as PTVehicleCollectedTime, -1 as PTVehicleCollectedCycleTime
